snippet: As of Tuesday afternoon, Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey was refusing to make public the interviews that, his lawyer asserts, “vindicate” the governor in the traffic-jam-as-punishment scheme run by his aides.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column questions why New Jersey Gov Chris Christie does not just show the goods and make public interviews that, his lawyer asserts, 'vindicate' him in the traffic-jam-as-punishment scheme run by his aides.
lead_paragraph: As of Tuesday afternoon, Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey was refusing to make public the interviews that, his lawyer asserts, “vindicate” the governor in the traffic-jam-as-punishment scheme run by his aides.

headline.main: Missing From Christie’s Proof-of-Innocence Claim: The Proof
headline.print_headline: Missing From Christie’s Proof-of-Innocence Claim: The Proof
